rukus.text: Tumi laksya karaa na'ine, ami kaphirasakalara babe cayatanaboraka erai thaicho, sihamtaka beya kamata bisesabharae pralubdha karaara babe
eteke sihamtara bisaye tumi kharakheda nakaraiba. Arasye ami sihamtara nirdharaita kala ganana karai acho
yidina rahamanara ocarata muttakbisakalaka sanmanita atithiraupe ami samabeta karaima
arau aparaadhibilakaka trsnatura arasthata jahannamara phale khedi niya ha’ba
Yisakale rahamanara paraa pratisrauti laiche, te'omlokara bahirae kone'o chuparaicha karaiba noraaraiba
Arau sihamte kaya, ‘rahamane santana grahana karaiche’
Arasye tomaloke eta bibhatsa bisayara aratarana karaicha
yara phalata akasasamuha bidirna hai yoraara upakrama haya, arau prthirai khanda-bikhanda ha’ba arau pahara-parbata curna-bicurna hai yaba
e'i karane ye, sihamte rahamanara prati santana araopa karaiche
Athaca santana grahana karaa rahamanara babe sobhaniya nahaya
Akasasamuha arau prthiraita enekuraa kono na'i yiye rahamanara ocarata bandaraupe upasthita naha’ba
Te'om sihamtara sankhya jane arau te'om sihamtaka bisesabharae ganana karai thaiche
arau kiyamatara dina sihamta sakalorae te'omra ocarata akalasaraiya hai ahiba
Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche rahamane arasye te'omlokara babe (bandasakalara hrdayata) bhalaporaa srsti karaiba
Arau ami tomara bhasata kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho yate tumi iyara dbaraa muttakbisakalaka susambada diba paraa arau bitandapraiya sampradayaka iyara dbaraa satarka karaiba paraa
Arau sihamtara purbe ami kimana ye prajanmaka binasa karaicho! Tumi sihamtara karaobara astitba anubhara karaichane athaba ksinatakaiyo ksina kono sabda sunibalai poraa ne
